shortdesc.ph: Used to configure color enhancement effects.

plentry.pd:
Color enhancement level. Range [0.0, 1.0].
0.0: Default, no color enhancement.
The higher the value, the stronger the color enhancement. Default is 0.5.

Skin tone protection level. Range [0.0, 1.0].
0.0: Disable skin tone protection.
The higher the value, the stronger the protection. Default is 1.0.
When the color enhancement level is high, facial skin tones may be distorted. It is recommended to set an appropriate skin protection level.
When the skin protection level is high, the color enhancement effect may be slightly reduced. To achieve the best result, adjust strengthLevel and skinProtectLevel based on actual needs.

Strength level of color enhancement. Value range: [0.0, 1.0].
0.0: Default. No color enhancement is applied to the video.
The higher the value, the stronger the color enhancement effect. Default is 0.5.

Strength level of skin tone protection. Value range: [0.0, 1.0].
0.0: Skin tone protection is disabled.
The higher the value, the stronger the skin tone protection effect. Default is 1.0.
When color enhancement strength is high, skin tones may appear distorted. It is recommended to set an appropriate skin protection level.
Higher skin protection levels may slightly reduce the color enhancement effect. To achieve the best result, you are advised to adjust strengthLevel and skinProtectLevel based on actual needs.
